title: Martha Stewart's Cupcakes: 175 Inspired Ideas
description:
Martha Stewart Living Magazine, "Martha Stewart's Cupcakes: 175 Inspired Ideas for Everyone's Favorite Treat"

English | ISBN: 0307460444 | 2009 | EPUB | 352 pages | 48 MB

The perfect cupcake for every occasion.

Swirled and sprinkled, dipped and glazed, or otherwise fancifully decorated, cupcakes are the treats that make everyone smile. They are the star attraction for special days, such as birthdays, showers, and holidays, as well as perfect everyday goodies. Alongside traditional favorites like yellow buttermilk cupcakes swirled with fluffy vanilla frosting and devilÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s food cupcakes crowned with rich, dark chocolate buttercream, there are also sweet surprises such as peanut butter and jelly cupcakes, dainty delights like tiny almond-cherry tea cakes, and festive showstoppers topped with marizpan ladybugs or candy clowns.
